text: If you're going through the effort to transform a work enough to create original content, you may as well write your own piece. You should quote them and give them a backlink, especially if they are not a competitor. There's nothing wrong with citing someone else's work, as long as you give them credit and a link, and make it clear in your own article that it's their work.
